001
002package io.vrap.rmf.okhttp;
003
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.util.Map;
006import java.util.Objects;
007import java.util.Optional;
008import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
009import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
010import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
011import java.util.function.Supplier;
012import java.util.stream.Collectors;
013
014import javax.validation.constraints.NotNull;
015
016import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpHeaders;
017import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpRequest;
018import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpResponse;
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.VrapHttpClient;
020import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.Utils;
021
022import okhttp3.*;
023import okhttp3.internal.http.RealResponseBody;
024import okio.GzipSource;
025import okio.Okio;
026
027/**
028 * HttpClient using OkHttp
029 */
030@Deprecated
031public class VrapOkHttpClient implements VrapHttpClient, AutoCloseable {
032
033    private final Supplier<OkHttpClient.Builder> clientBuilder = () -> new OkHttpClient.Builder()
034            .connectTimeout(120, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
035            .writeTimeout(120, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
036            .readTimeout(120, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
037            .addInterceptor(new UnzippingInterceptor());
038
039    private final OkHttpClient okHttpClient;
040
041    public VrapOkHttpClient() {
042        okHttpClient = clientBuilder.get().build();
043    }
044
045    public VrapOkHttpClient(BuilderOptions options) {
046        okHttpClient = options.plus(clientBuilder.get()).build();
047    }
048
049    public VrapOkHttpClient(Supplier<OkHttpClient.Builder> builderSupplier) {
050        okHttpClient = builderSupplier.get().build();
051    }
052
053    public VrapOkHttpClient(int maxRequests, int maxRequestsPerHost) {
054        Dispatcher dispatcher = new Dispatcher();
055        dispatcher.setMaxRequests(maxRequests);
056        dispatcher.setMaxRequestsPerHost(maxRequestsPerHost);
057        okHttpClient = clientBuilder.get().dispatcher(dispatcher).build();
058    }
059
060    public VrapOkHttpClient(ExecutorService executor, int maxRequests, int maxRequestsPerHost) {
061        Dispatcher dispatcher = new Dispatcher(executor);
062        dispatcher.setMaxRequests(maxRequests);
063        dispatcher.setMaxRequestsPerHost(maxRequestsPerHost);
064        okHttpClient = clientBuilder.get().dispatcher(dispatcher).build();
065    }
066
067    private static final String CONTENT_TYPE = "Content-Type";
068    private static final MediaType JSON = MediaType.get("application/json; charset=utf-8");
069    private static final byte[] emptyBody = new byte[0];
070
071    @Override
072    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
073        return makeRequest(okHttpClient, toRequest(request)).thenApply(VrapOkHttpClient::toResponse);
074
075    }
076
077    private static ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> toResponse(final Response response) {
078        ApiHttpHeaders apiHttpHeaders = new ApiHttpHeaders(response.headers()
079                .toMultimap()
080                .entrySet()
081                .stream()
082                .flatMap(e -> e.getValue().stream().map(value -> ApiHttpHeaders.headerEntry(e.getKey(), value)))
083                .collect(Collectors.toList()));
084
085        ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> apiHttpResponse = new ApiHttpResponse<>(response.code(), apiHttpHeaders,
086            Optional.ofNullable(response.body()).map(Utils.wrapToCompletionException(ResponseBody::bytes)).orElse(null),
087            response.message());
088        if (apiHttpResponse.getBody() != null) {
089            response.close();
090        }
091        return apiHttpResponse;
092    }
093
094    private static Request toRequest(final ApiHttpRequest apiHttpRequest) {
095
096        Request.Builder httpRequestBuilder = new Request.Builder().url(apiHttpRequest.getUrl());
097
098        //set headers
099        for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : apiHttpRequest.getHeaders().getHeaders()) {
100            httpRequestBuilder = httpRequestBuilder.header(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
101        }
102
103        if (apiHttpRequest.getMethod() == null) {
104            throw new IllegalStateException("apiHttpRequest method should be non null");
105        }
106
107        //default media type is JSON, if other media type is set as a header, use it
108        MediaType mediaType = JSON;
109        if (apiHttpRequest.getHeaders()
110                .getHeaders()
111                .stream()
112                .anyMatch(s -> s.getKey().equalsIgnoreCase(CONTENT_TYPE))) {
113            mediaType = MediaType
114                    .get(Objects.requireNonNull(apiHttpRequest.getHeaders().getFirst(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE)));
115        }
116
117        final RequestBody body = apiHttpRequest.getBody() == null ? null
118                : RequestBody.create(apiHttpRequest.getBody(), mediaType);
119        httpRequestBuilder.method(apiHttpRequest.getMethod().name(), body);
120        return httpRequestBuilder.build();
121    }
122
123    private CompletableFuture<Response> makeRequest(OkHttpClient client, Request request) {
124        Call call = client.newCall(request);
125        OkHttpResponseFuture result = new OkHttpResponseFuture();
126        call.enqueue(result);
127        return result.future;
128    }
129
130    private static class OkHttpResponseFuture implements Callback {
131        public final CompletableFuture<Response> future = new CompletableFuture<>();
132
133        public OkHttpResponseFuture() {
134        }
135
136        @Override
137        public void onFailure(Call call, IOException e) {
138            future.completeExceptionally(e);
139        }
140
141        @Override
142        public void onResponse(Call call, Response response) throws IOException {
143            future.complete(response);
144        }
145    }
146
147    @Override
148    public void close() throws IOException {
149        okHttpClient.dispatcher().executorService().shutdown();
150        okHttpClient.connectionPool().evictAll();
151        if (okHttpClient.cache() != null)
152            Objects.requireNonNull(okHttpClient.cache()).close();
153    }
154
155    private static class UnzippingInterceptor implements Interceptor {
156        @Override
157        @NotNull
158        public Response intercept(Chain chain) throws IOException {
159            Response response = chain.proceed(chain.request());
160            return unzip(response);
161        }
162
163        private Response unzip(final Response response) throws IOException {
164            if (!"gzip".equalsIgnoreCase(response.header("Content-Encoding"))) {
165                return response;
166            }
167
168            ResponseBody responseBody = response.body();
169            if (responseBody == null) {
170                return response;
171            }
172
173            GzipSource gzipSource = new GzipSource(responseBody.source());
174            Headers strippedHeaders = response.headers()
175                    .newBuilder()
176                    .removeAll("Content-Encoding")
177                    .removeAll("Content-Length")
178                    .build();
179            String contentType = response.header("Content-Type");
180            return response.newBuilder()
181                    .headers(strippedHeaders)
182                    .body(new RealResponseBody(contentType, -1L, Okio.buffer(gzipSource)))
183                    .build();
184        }
185    }
186}
